body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.3 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Beginnings of ddraw overlay support.
Many more crypt32 functions.
Improved support for tables in Richedit.
Support for NETWM window maximization.
Many installer fixes.
Tweaks for better PulseAudio support.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
